name: Buttery Bread Machine Loaf
description: The downside to any bread machine loaf is that the loaf itself is never pretty. It's usually a little lumpy here or there, crooked, or uneven. This isn't a loaf you present at the table and people say "wow." But once you slice it, that pretty shape doesn't matter any more.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to bread machine in the order specified by the manufacturer. If your machine has several settings, set it for a small/medium loaf, light crust, regular loaf.
Start machine. When the bread is done, remove from the bread machine and let cool completely on a rack before slicing.
